Blog.post: Today was soooo cool!! I went ova Dans (who was eating nonstop lmao) n i met dans mum who was nice. Went ova n then helped Dan do his paper round (tho we didnt walk it coz we went to Mc Arthour Glen or howeva u spell it :S:S anyways went bac to Dans house and . . . . . . . . met rach D she is sooo cool. The green pea lmao a giant green pea. We got Dan bac 4 ticklin her Rach put the duvet ova his head n i tickled Dans feet n Dan screams like a girl n was callin 4 him mum n dad funni as fook (faf lmao rach ) awww soo cute!! Me n dan n tom got rach to dan was holin her down i took of her shoe (y is it so hard to get off) n tom lmao gave her a wedgie n dan n rach tried to give tom one aswell lmao. N Tom is coool too hes wicked :D i fell off the bed again n Dan ripped toms Iron Miden poster : poor tom. Then dans mum took me home n tom n rach came coz they were goin to tom n dans nans. Rach wanted to see tom the dog n i didnt name him tom my dad did :$ so i put him on his lead n showed rach :) btw did i mention shes cool :D anyways goin now to ride my bike or somethin c, ya

Sunday: Was suppost to meet dan in twn on sunday i got there half an hour l8 coz my mum wasnt ready n we left the house @ 12.30 the time i was suppost to be there n then had to pick my sis up coz my mum dosent like goin into twn lol anyway got there n dan wasnt there :'( so i went to dunelm mill with my mum be4 she went to wrk then stayed ova my sisters house all day again but it was funni (baby cakes u just done no noooo, how i i, wanna let u go go lmao josh) lol foned dan l8r n he sed he went to the cinema to see wat was on then went bac but i wasnt there but it didnt really matter lol. Monday: I think i went to swansea on monday. . . . yeah i did n i went to my grandparents n met my sis in crazy max (crappy shop but my mum goes there lol) didnt do much pushed my baby neice round the shop im soo good with babys but i h8 them wen there 2-5 yrs old :@ Grrrrrrrrrrr she is sooo tiny n lush n just cuddles into u :D i probably went on msn wen i got home n tlked to dan on the fone wile on webcam to him ;) Today: Dan came ova today :D it was sooo cool coz my mum was in wrk n my dad was in bed:)! He came in n i showed him my house lol e.g this is the study were i wait 4 hours 4 u to cum on msn (pretty sad really but never mind) this is the livin room ect ect. N then we went to my room n tlken n then dan was naggin me to go to mc.donalds n asda so in the end i sed ooooooooooook!! Went to mc.donalds n then watched a bit of love actually but cudnt be botherd so we went to my room n watched freaky friday insted n dan threw a pillow @ me n i went to get it n fell of the bed :(:( me n rach fall off beds lmao Walked the dog n then went to asda AGAIN to get a drink lol coz all i got is crappy vimto n then he had to go home :(:( i saw his house tho :D itz cool dans room is tiny tho. I met dans mum to i hope she likes me :S:S

Hiya, had a fight on msn this mornin n was rally fun :D about 1'o'clock this mornin me dan tom n rach were fighting wif fanny :) Twas coooooooool!!!! Unibrow 8-) lol rach Was suppost to go to twn wif dan, rach n tom 2day ended up not goin cos dan went ova his friends coz he sed he promised to do summat with him?!?!?! Nooooooooooooo didnt bother to tell me @ the time but dw lol Went to B&Q today (worst shop in the world might i add) but it was funni coz i was with my sis. I had to go bac in the car with her but she had the bebies so i was in the back of the car lyin down with all the wood n plaster board it was relly fun but really uncomfortable. Anyways goin to lone on msn (no-ones on btw hence the lonin thin) C, ya :P

My blog now allows anonomus comments so comment away :D Name: Date of Birth: Star Sign: Eye Colour: Hair Colour: Wat hand do u write with: Fave colour: Fave Band atm: Fave Song atm: Do u have a b/f or g/f: Wat are u most afraid of: Wat do u think of friday 13th: Are you a sore loser: Cats or Dogs: Tea of coffee: Pop or alcohol: R&B or Pop (music wise): How many times have u stayed overnight in a hospital: Fone or txt: Wats your fave food: Wats your fave book: Wat do u think of msn: Trousers or a skirt: Maths or Science: Wat coudnt u live without: Txt or e-mail: Red or black: Are you organised or messy: How many posters do u have: Wat are they of and where are they: How many different houses have u lived in: Where were they: Do u have any siblings: If yes how many: Why is 6 afraid of 7 : Do u have any scars:

Rach let me nick this off hers lol coz i im tired but want to stay up l8 so this is to keep me occipied !!! enjoy // series one - --Name: Sarah -- Current Location: Cardiff -- Eye Color: Blue -- Hair Color: brown with blond highlites :) -- Righty or Lefty: lefty -- Innie or Outtie: Innie // series two - either or -- Pepsi or coke: Coke -- McDonald's or Burger King: McDonalds -- Single or group dates: Single with friends -- Adidas or nike: Nike -- Lipton Ice Tea or Nestea: none -- Chocolate or vanilla: Chocolate -- Cappuccino or coffee: Cappuccino -- Boxers or briefs: Boxers (on guys) yeah lmao // series five - do you -- Smoke: No yuk -- Cuss: Yes -- Take a shower everyday: Nope -- Have a crush(es): yes -- who are they: Dan :) -- Do you think you've been in love: i dont no i think i am now :$ :) -- Want to go to college: yeah -- Like high school: im still in it so ill tell u wen i dnt go there ne more -- Want to get married: Yeah i hope ---type with your fingers on the right keys: Yeah wen im not tired :) -- Believe in yourself: I beleive i have determination n if i set my mind to somethin i will do it -- Get motion sickness: Nope -- Think you're attractive:i duno do u?? -- Think you're a health freak: Nope -- Get along with your parents: Yup -- Like thunderstorms: No the freak me out :(:(i hate them :'( //series six - in the past month, did/have you -- Drink alcohol: Nope -- Made Out: Ive kissed thats all :$:$ -- Go on a date: Yeah :) my first :) -- go to the mall?: Yes -- Eaten an entire box of Oreos: wdf are oreos -- Eaten sushi: Nope itz discusting errrr -- Been on stage: Yeah with the bans lmao -- Been dumped: yeah :( --Gone skating: Yes -- Made homemade cookies: Nope -- Been in love: Yes -- Gone skinny dipping: No :s -- Dyed your hair: nope -- Stolen anything: nooo // series seven - have you ever -- Played a game that required removal of clothing: nope --Been trashed or extremely intoxicated:no --Been caught "doing something": no -- Been called a tease: Yes probably -- Gotten beaten up: Nope :) -- Shoplifted: No -- If so, did you get caught: N/a -- Changed who you were to fit in: Nope // series eight - the future -- Age you hope to be married: ummm i duno weneva i want to -- Numbers and Names of Children: 2 or 3 girl twins n a boy -- Describe your Dream Wedding: in the winter with a dark red weddin dress -- Where you want to go to college: umm i duno -- What do you want to be when you grow up: a lawyer -- What country would you most like to visit: Australia // series nine - opposite sex (or same sex, if that's your cup of tea) -- Best eye color: ne colour there all lush -- Best hair color?: Brown/black -- Short or long hair?: Long -- Best height: Tall -- Best weight: Preferably not obese -- Best articles of clothing: socks :D -- Best first date location: Town -- Best first kiss location: Cinema :D // series ten - number of -- Number of girls kissed: 0 -- Number of boys kissed: 1 -- Number of drugs taken illegally: 0 -- Number of people I could trust with my life: ummm umm i duno :S:S -- Number of CDs that I own: loads :D -- Number of piercings: 2 -- Number of tattoos: 0 -- Number of times my name has appeared in the newspaper?: i had my pic in the paper once -- Number of scars on my body: 2 n chicken poc scars lol -- Number of things in my past that I regret: ummm quite a few

Stupid bleech. y did they invent it anyway it only ruins clothes. Sumhow bleech got on my lonsdale (townie make lol rach) jacket n not its ruined :'( and my mum was moanin @ me about how i dnt look after my clothes coz i got holes in my quicksilver t-shirt :'( that wasnt my fault tho it was the dog do you really think i would go round makin holes in my best t-shirts really : Aww well my dad sed we could bleech the whole thing lmao n make it white : well i might give it a try coz itz ruined neways n i really liked the quicksilver t-shirt but it has lil holes n a big stain on it :$ Anyways . . . . . . . . . . . Cats I love my cat. Sumhow we called him Teddybear lmao i think it was coz wen he was a kitten my mum sed he looked like a teddybear : ive had Teddy since he was a day old n his bro n sis but we gave them away. Grrr My mum mones @ me that im spendin toooo much time on msn well frankly mum i think your spending too much time smokin!!!! Well its not my fault im on msn all the time if sum1 was on msn more (no names mentioned )i wudnt be on here all the time not to mention msn is very addicting it worse than the sims well gtg now c, u

I saw my baby niece today. She is sooooooooooooo cute n lush (cardiff word rach :) i was holdin her while Dan was playin checkers with wat her thought was me but it was my grandfather :D n guess wat I WON. I played him after than on my own n lost :( I saw Cameron too (my nephew) hes lush he wudnt let me go i love him to bits n Lily (my niece lol havent used her name yet) I played checkers with dan again wen i got home n i won :) altho he sed he let me win. Dan n Tom r such sore losers Well got to take my dog for a walk see u soon P.S Rach did not cheat @ minesweepers

1. Who are you? 2. Are we friends? 3. When and how did we meet? 4. How have I affected you? 5. What do you think of me? 6. What's the fondest memory you have of me? 7. How long do you think we will be friends? 8. Do you love me? 9. Do you have a crush on me? 10. Would you kiss me? 11. Would you hug me? 12. Physically, what stands out? 13. Emotionally, what stands out? 14. Do you wish I was cooler? 15. On a scale of 1-10, how hot am I? 16. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it? 17. Am I loveable? 18. How long have you known me? 19. Describe me in one word. 20. What was your first impression? 21. Do you still think that way about me now? 22. What do you think my weakness is? 23. Do you think I'll get married? n to who? 24. Would you ever go out with me? Again? 25. What makes me sad? 26. What reminds you of me? 27. If you could give me anything what would it be? 28. How well do you know me? 29. When's the last time you saw me? 30. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't? 31. Do you think I could kill someone? Add comments to this ok copy n pate it and answer the questions :)

Went to Ross-on-Wye today (dont know where it is tho lol) Got an addresse book yay ive wanted one 4 ages **sad** Then went to Monmothshire and got a really cool coushin n a book that ive wanted yaaaaaaaaaaay. Tlked to Sarah on msn then n she had to go 4 her tea so im lonin :( aww well im gonna go lone sum more lol c, ya

Hiya, lol i dnt know wat to write??? well i miss dan :( i like tlkin to ppl on msn lol even though it causes arguements n bores u to death!!! havent done much today walked the dog at like 10 lol. i tlked to rach on msn 4 most of the day (wat a very exciting life i lead). My b/d a month today yaaaaaaaaay 14 at last!! I went to twn 4 the second time wifout my parents on tuesday wif vicki n dan. saw dan n tom on their webcam today n saw somethin else lmao rach. well im gonna go now coz i got a headache that ive had all day n sarah im sorry 4 erlier!! c, u
